comments_since_last_sample.body:
Americans are happy that US Covid deaths are down to 1,300 per day. New Zealand's total Covid deaths over 20 months is 28.
Americans must be embarrassed that they have 46 times New Zealand's 20 month total EVERY DAY!

Population:      US 333M       NZ 5M   American population is 66 times larger than New Zealand. 
Covid deaths:  US 766,117   NZ 28    American Covid deaths is 27,361 times larger than New Zealand.

Because even though not everyone is vaccinated, everyone is vaccinated. The effects of vaccination spread to all people, like it does with flu shots.

Isnt it the present regime in Maharashtra incompetent and a failure but ensures that unconstitutional methods of restricting common people are gaining ground.  Not allowed to travel by local train, unconstitutional orders that goes against the freedom of movement in a democracy and behaving like a dictatorship by forcing vaccine compulsory for travelling by local train. Even in BEST Buses, the drivers and conductors at their whims and fancies are not STOPING at bus stops, putting passengers at hardship and wait of 1 to 2 hours, though these buses are purchased from taxes paid by all the common man who uses these.  Also, at APMC Market, one has to wait for 1 to 2 hours before a BEST Bus stops that too due to traffic jam.  Common man are put at hardship in a democracy because no one voices grievances due to lack of knowledge.  Any Govt. failure is known by the methods they use.

Also, in such Covid-19 situations, instead of increasing buses to a destination, BEST has curtailed the 504 and 506 to Deonar Bus Stand instead of running up to Vadala Station, this too is a repressive step by MVA Govt.  Seem nobody at the helm of affairs has an idea about the GROUND SITUATION, that is turning from bad to worse, due to such unconstitutional orders passed and behaving like a dictatorship.
